name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-oriented Senior Quality Engineer with 13+ years of experience in software testing and quality assurance methodologies. Proficient in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, and **Python**, with hands-on experience in **CI/CD pipelines** and automated testing frameworks like **Playwright**. Extensive knowledge of cloud environments including **AWS** and **Azure**, enhancing deployment strategies and performance testing.
Skilled in troubleshooting, root cause analysis, and implementing process improvements to drive quality and efficiency. Background includes building high-performance applications and aligning solutions with compliance standards in the healthcare and financial industries.

• Implemented robust **software testing** methodologies, including performance testing and automated testing frameworks such as Playwright, Jest, and Cypress to enhance system stability and performance in web applications built with **JavaScript** and **TypeScript**.
• Conducted thorough troubleshooting and root cause analysis to identify and resolve defects in complex systems, driving process improvement initiatives that increased quality and reduced time to market by up to **30%**.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to enforce **QA methodologies** and ensure compliance with industry standards throughout the software development lifecycle.
• Created, executed, and maintained automated test scripts to validate the functionality and performance of web applications, achieving a **95%** test coverage across critical features.
• Assisted in the design and implementation of testing strategies for mobile applications developed with modern frameworks like Flutter and React Native, ensuring compatibility across **iOS** and **Android** platforms.
• Actively participated in sprint planning sessions and retrospectives to continuously improve the workflow process, resulting in a notable reduction in bug rates by **20%**.
• Engaged in continuous learning and professional development, staying updated with the latest trends and technologies in **JavaScript**, **Python**, and testing frameworks to maintain competitive edge.
